prompts: Create a playful fairy-type Pokemon with a round body and large ears.
Imagine a cute, fluffy creature that loves to sing and dance under the moonlight.
Show me a whimsical character inspired by the beauty of nature and magical forests.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies joy and positivity, with a soft pastel color palette.
Design a charming creature that can produce soothing sounds to calm others.

Make a friendly fairy-type Pokemon that has a heart-shaped symbol on its body.
